mapper.sql:
t_house_rent_asset.id, t_house_rent_asset.asset_id AS assetId, t_house_rent_asset.community_id AS communityId, t_house_rent_asset.house_type_id AS houseTypeId, t_house_rent_asset.landlord_id AS landlordId, t_house_rent_asset.area, t_house_rent_asset.introduce_picture AS introducePicture, t_house_rent_asset.server_id AS serverId, t_house_rent_asset.cover, t_house_rent_asset.title, t_house_rent_asset.price, t_house_rent_asset.slide, t_house_rent_asset.rent_describe, t_house_rent_asset.rent_status AS rentStatus, t_house_rent_asset.status, t_house_rent_asset.note, t_house_rent_asset.rent_time AS rentTime, t_house_rent_asset.shelves_time AS shelvesTime, t_house_rent_asset.rate AS rate, t_house_rent_asset.house_number AS houseNumber, t_house_rent_asset.floor AS floor, t_house_rent_asset.toward AS toward, t_house_rent_asset.building_code AS buildingCode, t_house_rent_asset.community_name AS communityName, t_house_rent_asset.configuration_status AS configurationStatus, t_house_rent_asset.custom_images_list AS customimageslist, t_house_rent_asset.state AS state, t_house_rent_asset.contract_start_time AS contractStartTime, t_house_rent_asset.contract_end_time AS contractEndTime, t_house_rent_asset.contract_time_limit AS contractTimeLimit,
t_end_user.name As serverName, t_end_user.phone AS serverPhone, t_end_user.avatar AS serverAvatar
mapper.select: SELECT t_house_rent_asset.*,t_end_user.name as landlordName,t_end_user.real_name as landlordRealName, t_end_user.avatar as landlordAvatar,t_end_user.phone as landlordPhone, t_end_user.contact FROM t_house_rent_asset JOIN t_end_user on t_end_user.id = t_house_rent_asset.landlord_id WHERE t_house_rent_asset.id = #{id} GROUP BY t_house_rent_asset.id

SELECT
FROM t_house_rent_asset LEFT JOIN t_end_user ON t_end_user.id = t_house_rent_asset.server_id LEFT JOIN t_end_user as loadord ON loadord.id = t_house_rent_asset.landlord_id
WHERE 1=1
AND t_house_rent_asset.id = #{record.id}
AND loadord.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.landlordName},'%')
AND loadord.realName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.landlordRealName},'%')
AND t_house_rent_asset.asset_id =#{record.assetId}
AND t_house_rent_asset.community_id =#{record.communityId}
AND t_house_rent_asset.house_type_id =#{record.houseTypeId}
AND t_house_rent_asset.landlord_id =#{record.landlordId}
AND t_house_rent_asset.area LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.area},'%')
AND t_house_rent_asset.rate LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.rate},'%')
AND t_house_rent_asset.introduce_picture LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.introducePicture},'%')
AND t_house_rent_asset.server_id =#{record.serverId}
AND t_house_rent_asset.cover LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.cover},'%')
AND t_house_rent_asset.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.title},'%')
AND t_house_rent_asset.price LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.price},'%')
AND t_house_rent_asset.slide LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.slide},'%')
AND t_house_rent_asset.rent_describe LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.rentDescribe},'%')
AND t_house_rent_asset.rent_status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.rentStatus},'%')
AND t_house_rent_asset.note LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.note},'%')
AND t_house_rent_asset.rent_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.rentTime},'%')
AND t_house_rent_asset.shelves_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.shelvesTime},'%')
AND t_house_rent_asset.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND t_house_rent_asset.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}
mapper.sql:
t_house_rent_asset.*, t_house_asset.id AS assetId, t_house_asset.building_id AS buildingId, t_house_asset.unit_id AS unitId, t_house_asset.floor, t_house_asset.number, t_house_asset.asset_slot AS assetSlot, t_house_asset.asset_type AS assetType, t_house_asset.asset_flag AS assetFlag, t_house_asset.house_type_id AS houseTypeId,
t_house_property_building.cad_picture AS cadPicture, t_house_property_building.code AS buildingCode, t_house_property_building_unit.direction AS direction,
t_house_property_community.id AS communityId, t_house_property_community.community AS communityName, t_house_property_community.address AS address,
t_house_design_model.id AS designModelId, t_house_design_model.house_type AS houseType, t_house_design_model.description AS houseTypeDescription, t_house_design_model.house_type_picture AS houseTypePicture,
t_house_vr_picture.vr_picture AS vrPicture, t_house_vr_picture.link AS vrLink, t_house_vr_picture.snapshot AS vrSnapshot,
t_house_design_model.area AS houseTypeArea,
loadord.id AS userId, loadord.name AS username, loadord.avatar AS userAvatar, loadord.phone AS userPhone,
service.name AS serverName, service.phone AS serverPhone, service.contact AS serverContact, service.avatar AS serverAvatar
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_house_rent_asset LEFT JOIN t_end_user as loadord ON loadord.id = t_house_rent_asset.landlord_id LEFT JOIN t_end_user as service ON service.id = t_house_rent_asset.server_id left join t_house_asset on t_house_rent_asset.asset_id=t_house_asset.id left JOIN t_house_property_building ON t_house_property_building.id = t_house_asset.building_id left JOIN t_house_property_community ON t_house_property_community.id = t_house_property_building.community_id left JOIN t_house_property_building_unit on t_house_asset.unit_id = t_house_property_building_unit.id left JOIN t_house_design_model ON t_house_property_building_unit.design_model_id = t_house_design_model.id left join t_house_vr_picture on t_house_vr_picture.id = t_house_design_model.vr_id
WHERE 1=1
AND t_house_rent_asset.state != 1
AND t_house_rent_asset.landlord_id =#{record.landlordId}
AND
`t_house_rent_asset`.`building_code` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item},'%')
AND
`t_house_property_building_unit`.`unit_code` LIKE CONCAT('___',#{item})
AND
`t_house_rent_asset`.`toward` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item},'%')
AND (`t_house_rent_asset`.`floor` BETWEEN #{record.startFloor} AND #{record.endFloor})
AND t_house_rent_asset.id =#{record.id}
AND t_house_rent_asset.asset_id =#{record.assetId}
AND t_house_property_community.id =#{record.communityId}
AND t_house_rent_asset.community_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.communityName},'%')
AND t_house_design_model.id =#{record.houseTypeId}
AND t_house_design_model.description LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.houseType},'%')
AND loadord.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.landlordName},'%')
AND loadord.realName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.landlordRealName},'%')
AND t_house_rent_asset.area LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.area},'%')
AND t_house_rent_asset.rate LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.rate},'%')
AND t_house_rent_asset.introduce_picture LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.introducePicture},'%')
AND t_house_rent_asset.server_id =#{record.serverId}
AND t_house_rent_asset.cover LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.cover},'%')
AND t_house_rent_asset.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.title},'%')
AND t_house_rent_asset.price LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.price},'%')
AND t_house_rent_asset.slide LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.slide},'%')
AND t_house_rent_asset.rent_describe LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.rentDescribe},'%')
AND t_house_rent_asset.rent_status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.rentStatus},'%')
AND t_house_rent_asset.note LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.note},'%')
AND t_house_rent_asset.rent_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.rentTime},'%')
AND t_house_rent_asset.shelves_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.shelvesTime},'%')
AND t_house_rent_asset.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND t_house_rent_asset.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}
ORDER BY t_house_rent_asset.rent_status Desc ,t_house_rent_asset.update_time DESC,t_house_rent_asset.create_time DESC
ORDER BY t_house_rent_asset.rent_status ASC ,t_house_rent_asset.state ASC,t_house_rent_asset.update_time DESC,t_house_rent_asset.create_time DESC
ORDER BY t_house_rent_asset.update_time DESC,t_house_rent_asset.create_time DESC
